languages.text: "Вы нужны мне здесь, сенешаль Версериан. Без вашего надежного плеча мне не на кого опереться, не опасаясь измены".

traits.locale_text: [draft] Поддержать консерватизм и службу Сенешаля до самого конца

languages.text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."
languages.original_text: "Вы нужны мне здесь, сенешаль Версериан. Без вашего надежного плеча мне не на кого опереться, не опасаясь измены".

traits.locale_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."
"I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

"I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."
"I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

languages.text: "Ich brauche Euch hier, Truchsess Werserian. Nur an Eurer starken Schulter kann ich mich anlehnen, ohne Hochverrat fürchten zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

traits.locale_text: "Ich brauche Euch hier, Truchsess Werserian. Nur an Eurer starken Schulter kann ich mich anlehnen, ohne Hochverrat fürchten zu müssen."

languages.text: « J'ai besoin de vous à mes côtés, sénéchal Werserian. Vous êtes le seul sur lequel je peux m'appuyer sans craindre la moindre trahison. »
languages.original_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai besoin de vous à mes côtés, sénéchal Werserian. Vous êtes le seul sur lequel je peux m'appuyer sans craindre la moindre trahison. »

languages.text: “我需要你留在我身边，韦尔森总领。只有你有力的臂膀，才是我最值得信赖的依靠，让我永远不必担心背叛。”
languages.original_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

traits.locale_text: “我需要你留在我身边，韦尔森总领。只有你有力的臂膀，才是我最值得信赖的依靠，让我永远不必担心背叛。”

languages.text: 「お前がここには必要だ、ウェルザリアン家令長。その存在が、私が裏切りを恐れることなく頼れる唯一の頼れるものなのだから」
languages.original_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がここには必要だ、ウェルザリアン家令長。その存在が、私が裏切りを恐れることなく頼れる唯一の頼れるものなのだから」

languages.text: «Le necesito aquí, Senescal Werserian. Su hombro firme es lo único en lo que puedo apoyarme sin temor a la traición».
languages.original_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

traits.locale_text: «Le necesito aquí, Senescal Werserian. Su hombro firme es lo único en lo que puedo apoyarme sin temor a la traición».

languages.text: "Sana burada ihtiyacım var Seneşal Werserian. Hıyanet şüphesi olmadan yaslanabileceğim iki omuz varsa onlar da seninkiler."
languages.original_text: "I need you here, Seneschal Werserian. Your steady shoulder is all I have to lean on without fear of treason."

traits.locale_text: "Sana burada ihtiyacım var Seneşal Werserian. Hıyanet şüphesi olmadan yaslanabileceğim iki omuz varsa onlar da seninkiler."
